Nerangs.ab: ... aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca. ēn gyāg taštag kē-š hōm ud urwarām andar pad datuš abāz nihišn pad urwēs bē nihišn hāwan az kustag ī hōy ō kustag ī dašn āwarišn pad rōy frāz nigūn kunišn

"... aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca At this passage, he has to put again in contact with the datuš the saucer that contains the hōm and urwarām and (then) to put it on the urwēs; he has to bring the hāwan from the left side to the right side and put it upside-down."
daϑušō ahurahe mazdā̊ hōm pālag pad datuš abāg nihišn pad urwēs bē nihišn hāwan az kustag ī hōy be dast ī dašn āwarišn pad rōy frāz nigūn kunišn raēuuatō…

"Between daϑušō ahurahe mazdā̊ and raēuuatō…, he has to put in contact the hōm's saucer with the datuš and (then) to put it on the urwēs; he has to bring the hāwan from the left side to the right hand and put it upside-down."
